CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-1-TEXT: Roll twice on the Rod of Wonder table (Dungeon Master's Guide 237).
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-2-TEXT: You cannot cast any spells for 1 round.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-3-TEXT: The target gains a +8 enhancement bonus to %ABILITY-STR=Str% for 1d4 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-4-TEXT: Your attack hits the nearest ally and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-6-TEXT: You take a -4 penalty to attack rolls until you score a critical hit.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-8-TEXT: The attack deals damage to you instead of the target.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-9-TEXT: You provoke an attack of opportunity from all threatening foes.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-10-TEXT: You are %STATUS-STUNNED=stunned% for 1 round (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Str saving throw negates%).
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-13-TEXT: You take 2d6 points of acid damage.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-14-TEXT: The attack hits you and is a critical threat. You must roll to confirm the critical hit.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-15-TEXT: You take 2d6 points of fire damage.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-16-TEXT: You take 2d6 points of electricity damage.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-17-TEXT: You take a -4 penalty on attack rolls, saves, skill checks, and ability checks. This effect can only be cured with Remove curse.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-21-TEXT: Reroll attack against creature nearest the target (yourself excluded).
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-22-TEXT: Your attack hits your ally closest to the target.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-24-TEXT: You become %STATUS-RESTRAINED=restrained% with your gear until you spend a standard action to free yourself.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-26-TEXT: You take a -2 penalty to all your Spell DCs for 1d4 minutes.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-27-TEXT: The attack hits you but you must lose a spell or slot of the highest available level (your choice).
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-28-TEXT: You are teleported the nearest square adjacent to the target.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-29-TEXT: You take 1d4 points of damage to %ABILITY-INT=Int%, %ABILITY-WIS=Wis%, or %ABILITY-CHA=Cha% (determined randomly).
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-30-TEXT: You take 2d6 points of cold damage.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-31-TEXT: You cannot cast this spell for 24 hour.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-32-TEXT: Target increases one size category for 1d4 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-35-TEXT: On his next turn, your target may give you one Suggestion.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-36-TEXT: The highest level spell effect on you is transferred to your target.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-37-TEXT: 1d3 spell effects active on you are dispelled (determined randomly).
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-38-TEXT: You are thrown 1d6x10 feet into the air (or in a random direction if flying) (%SAVE-FUMBLE=Int saving throw negates%).
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-41-TEXT: The spell affects all targets within 30 feet of you. You are immune to this effect.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-42-TEXT: You can only take a move action next round.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-43-TEXT: The target gains SR equal to 11 + your caster level for 1d6 rounds.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-44-TEXT: One of your magic items permanently gains a random drawback (Dungeon Master's Guide 273).
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-46-TEXT: You automatically fail your next saving throw.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-47-TEXT: The spell hits you instead of the target (normal saves apply).
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-48-TEXT: Your spell is converted to a Summon monster spell of the same level. The monster attacks you.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-49-TEXT: 1d4+2 Mirror images spring up around your target. These images last for 1 minute or until destroyed.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-50-TEXT: A Stinking cloud appears, centered on you.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-51-TEXT: Lose one randomly determined spell or spell slot. Your target can cast this spell next round.
CARD-FUMBLE-MAGIC-52-TEXT: You lose one prepared spell or spell slot (determined randomly).
